clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the suppression of adrenal function in selected patients with Cushing s syndrome malignant neoplasm of the female breast and carcinoma in situ of the breast

contraindications.disease: Oral LD50s mg kg rats 1800 dogs 100 Intravenous LD50s mg kg rats 156 dogs 100 Symptoms of overdose include respiratory depression hypoventilation hypotension hypovolemic shock due to dehydration somnolence lethargy coma ataxia dizziness fatigue nausea and vomiting
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Aminoglutethimide inhibits the enzymatic conversion of cholesterol to D5 pregnenolone resulting in a decrease in the production of adrenal glucocorticoids mineralocorticoids estrogens and androgens
